channel.title: Computers on Ten thousand words...
channel.description: Recent content in Computers on Ten thousand words...

item.title: I blame Apple
item.description: I am a bit particular about keyboards. I find the keyboards on most computers to be trash, whether it’s a laptop or desktop. This has lead to our house having 3 quality mechanical keyboards, despite having only one desktop and one docking station (the odd one out, a classic 90’s “clicky” keyboard, was politely banned from our work space). This is also a reason I enjoy Lenovo laptops, as they tend to have better keyboards than most.

item.title: Data science on the cheap - pt. 2
item.description: This is the continuation of Data Science on the Cheap, where I discussed the potential to use a Chromebook as a cheap entry to data science. After trying the main configurations, I concluded that the easiest use case was to use the Chromebook as a cheap and portable terminal to access a bigger machine elsewhere. But that leaves you with only half of the equation - you still need the other machine.
